snippet: After a sexting ring was discovered at a high school in Cañon City, Colo., some residents responded by taking the glut of attention in stride as news media coverage continues in the town.
abstract: Residents of Canon City, Colo, strive for normalcy while under national media attention in aftermath of local high school scandal in which students were caught trading nude photos; most acknowledge seriousness of students' behavior, and express embarrassment, while some question whether transgression merits such high level of public exposure.
lead_paragraph: After a sexting ring was discovered at a high school in Cañon City, Colo., some residents responded by taking the glut of attention in stride as news media coverage continues in the town.

headline.main: A Colorado Town Unfamiliar With Attention Deals With a Flood of It
headline.print_headline: A Colorado Town Unfamiliar With Attention Deals With a Flood of It
